alert.note: Alert for Upper Koyukuk Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 07 at 8:11AM AKDT until August 08 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT AKDT TONIGHT FOR LIGHTNING FOR UPPER KOYUKUK VALLEY... * AFFECTED AREA...Upper Koyukuk Valley. * TIMING...From 4 PM this afternoon to midnight AKDT tonight. * LIGHTNING ACTIVITY LEVEL...4. * WINDS...Northwest 5 to 10 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 45 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs in the upper 70s and lower 80s. * IMPACTS...Frequent lightning could cause new fire starts. Thunderstorms will cause gusty and erratic winds in the late afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
